title: Caranor St. Study Group
question: Read Genesis 1:1. This is the first chapter of the Bible. What does it say?

title: Study with Dave
question: Jesus gives 3 promises in John 10:28. What are they?

answers.name: me
answers.answer: 1. eternal life; 2. never take them out of his hand; 3. no one else can remove them

answers.name: Dave
answers.answer: Eternal life, they shall never be taken from his hand, nobody else can remove them
